728521f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Church Lane
728521f-b.text:
Bay Street, adjoining the S. E. corner of
Church Lane, showing St. Mary's Roman Catholic
Church. The view is from Virginia Avenue.
February 2, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Viewing the church from St. Mary's Avenue.
September 4, 1936
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The church steeple.
May 22, 1938
P. L. Sperr
728521f-b.folder: Bay Street & Church Lane, Staten Island, NY
